title: SC | Breakdown Of Machinery in Manipur: SC
selftext: Now what? Modi has decided to simply ignore Manipur and courts.
comments:
I don’t see how the Supreme Court can take place of the executive.

The executive has failed. Supreme Court is trying but this way our institutions will lose the our credibility.

Executive is not functioning. If Supreme Court takes action, they will be accused of interference.
